about_the_game:
The objective is simple, defend people being accused of murder and find the real killer... the only problem is everyone involved in these murder cases are completely insane and helping you solve the case is the last thing on their mind, on top of that there is an mysterious organization conducting all these killings behind the scenes who will stop at nothing to make your job a living hell so it is your mission to expose take down and expose this mystery!

The courtroom is a puzzle where you will be put to the test, analyse what the witnesses claim to have gone down on the night of the murder and prove them wrong, check your evidence and compare it with what there saying to see if there telling the truth, find contradictions and make objections to prove there lying!

The courtroom has a long dark conspiracy hidden within that you have unknowingly been trapped in, slowly descend down its layers of lore and escape, watch your back   

- Four chapters. that amounts to 10+ hours of gameplay over the course of which the narrative gets increasingly more chaotic (also featuring a secret chapter)

- A huge cast of characters. all with unique personalities and interconnecting backstories but beware... not all of them survive

- The strongest character in fiction... Mr monkey

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains cartoon violence, implications of extreme violence and excessive swearing

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3.77 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3.77 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Assetflip attorney is a murder mystery satire visual novel, Solve crimes in a world where everyone has gone insane and everything feels like a fever dream, interrogate witnesses, hunt for clues and take down the criminal organization that threatens to destroy reality
